refnamediv.refpurpose: Initialise a spectral (f) variable to zero.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Performs the equivalent to an init operation on an f-variable.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: fsig pvsinit isize[, iolap, iwinsize, iwintype, iformat]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: fsig -- output pv stream set to zero.
isize -- size of the DFT frame.
iolap -- size of the analysis overlap, defaults to isize/4.
iwinsize -- size of the analysis window, defaults to isize.
iwintype -- type of analysis window, defaults to 1, Hanning.
